author: Vladimir Isachenkov/AP
title: Russia’s Foreign Minister Rejects Suggestion of Using the Pandemic to Expand Political Influence
description: Russia's foreign minister Tuesday angrily rejected claims that Moscow has used the coronavirus crisis to expand its political influence.
content:
(MOSCOW) — Russia’s foreign minister on Tuesday angrily rejected Western claims that Moscow has used the coronavirus crisis to expand its political influence, saying the world needs unity to surmount the pandemic.
